text: ITEM IV. I will, give, devise and bequeath unto my beloved son, [Person-4], the following property: all outside yard equipment, the contents of my bank account at the Bank of Ripley, one-half(1/2) of the bank insurance, and all of my Vanguard IRA profit sharing. I further will, give, devise and bequeath unto my beloved son, [Person-4], the washer and dryer he gave to me.

texts: the washer and dryer he gave to me
all outside yard equipment, the contents of my bank account at the Bank of Ripley, one-half(1/2) of the bank insurance, and all of my Vanguard IRA profit sharing
